name: Investor Relationship Manager
company: Công ty Cổ phần Tập đoàn GELEX

Work_location: Hà Nội: Gelex Tower, 52 Le Dai Hanh, Hai Ba Trung District, Ha Noi, Hai Bà Trưng

job_description: Building investment strategy and connecting Group’s BOD to share holders, personnel in Security companies, individual and institutional investors.
Expanding relationship and connecting with new investors to diversify capital mobilization channel of the Group.
Answering questions from share holders, investors regarding the Group’s investment activities.
Handling investor documentation: proposal, introductory slide about the Group/ new project, annual report…
Listing and maintaining relationship with potential investors.
Managing information in tab “Investor” in Group’s website.
Participating and implementing work relating to organization of Annual General Share holder meeting.
candidate_requirements: Bachelor degree in Finance, Banking, Economics … or related degrees.
Minimum 7 years of experience in financial investment; prior experience working in security companies, funds, IR department of large listed company is preferred.
Basic knowledge of Enterprise law and Security law.
English proficiency in all four skills; capable of presenting, discussing in English for expertise work.
Ability to work in team, work independently and withstand high work pressure.
interest: Salary: negotiable base on ability.
Reward for job performance, holiday allowance, vacations and training opportunities.
Full benefit following Labor’s law.
Health insurance Aon Care.
Opportunity to work in professional and friendly environment.
